english.segment1: Must be tiring to meet my resistance. My stubborn will can be so twisted. Pride can steal the best from me. But its not what I want. But Youre what I need. So I surrender
english.segment2: I want You. To take over me. I want You. To take over me. I dont wanna be part of the resistance. I wanna be part of the release. So I want You to take over me
english.segment3: Oh, I cant survive a state of existence. Struggling to find whats missin. I wanna win the war between these skin and bones. And whats underneath. So I surrender. Yeah, I surrender
english.segment4: I want You. To take over me. I want You. To take over me. I dont wanna be part of the resistance. I wanna be part of the release. So I want You to take over me, yeah
english.segment5: Never want to, never wanna be against You. Never meant to, never meant to resist You. I never want to, never want to be against You, against You. Oh, how could I resist You?!
english.segment6: So I want You. To take over me. I want You. To take over me. I dont wanna be part of the resistance. I wanna be part of the release. So I want You to take over me, yeah
